channel.title: Rsc Dedication Beta Brutal Pkerz Source work
channel.description:
[b][i]So here we are my fellow runescapers, Im here to happily tell you that i will be launching a RSC private server, my focuses will be pking and skilling and i will also support many other events, there is a large list of features already in place and they are constantly being updated daily.[/i][/b]
I will attach the beta client and please feel free to make an account and sign on.
I am excited to announce that we will have a subscription system. Im even happier to announce that i do not want your money for subscriptions. i will be implementing a Item Drop Like subscription Certificates, at a set amount you will get to sub.
[b][i]If your worried about a server that might not be around in a few years stop there. I have been playing runescape for many many years and have stayed true to Rsc. Find your home here with protected character logs so you will never lose your accounts and items. [/i][/b] What are you waiting for Jump on and sign in and check out some of the cool features already added! [size=24]Server Rates are 8x-16x Original Rsc XP Double Xp Events on weekends right now Fresh economy. Not many rune items yet. The only way to get dragon and rune is KBD and Black Dragon's Untill someone is 99 smithing. I will be hosting a few events for rares to put them in the economy and im working on replicating the original holiday drops. ****SKILLS ARE BATCHED***** MORE QUESTS COMING [/size]
Rsc Dedication staff, [size=16]*Slayer skill* COMPLETED *Castle Wars* [/size]*
[b][u]Commands[/u][/b]
::onlinelist ::skull ::fatigue ::noloot to disable or enable dropped items ::say to message everyone ::stuck f2 for menu F3 FOR SLAYER MENU ::MENU TO TOGGLE

item.dc:creator: @g0nef1shin g0nef1shin
item.description:
@g0nef1shin wrote:

So here we are my fellow runescapers, Im here to happily tell you that i will be launching a RSC private server, my focuses will be pking and skilling and i will also support many other events, there is a large list of features already in place and they are constantly being updated daily.

I will attach the beta client and please feel free to make an account and sign on.

I am excited to announce that we will have a subscription system. Im even happier to announce that i do not want your money for subscriptions. i will be implementing a Item Drop Like subscription Certificates, at a set amount you will get to sub.

If your worried about a server that might not be around in a few years stop there.
I have been playing runescape for many many years and have stayed true to Rsc. Find your home here with protected character logs so you will never lose your accounts and items.

What are you waiting for Jump on and sign in and check out some of the cool features already added!
[size=24]Server Rates are 8x-16x Original Rsc XP
Double Xp Events on weekends right now
Fresh economy. Not many rune items yet.
The only way to get dragon and rune is KBD and Black Dragonâ€™s Untill someone is 99 smithing.
I will be hosting a few events for rares to put them in the economy and im working on replicating the original holiday drops.
SKILLS ARE BATCHED*
MORE QUESTS COMING
[/size]

Rsc Dedication staff,
[size=16]Slayer skill COMPLETED
Castle Wars
[/size]*

Commands

::onlinelist
::skull
::fatigue
::noloot to disable or enable dropped items
::say to message everyone

f2 for menu
